title: Circular ashtray made from the base of an artillery shell
description: The shell is a British ’18 pounder’ shell. The date of manufacture for the shell is given as 1916 on the base of the ashtray. Also on the base there is something else interesting lorem ipsum
hint: This object is in the far left hand corner of the court in the cabinet labelled “Recycling Display” (as you look away from the shop and towards the back of the museum).
